origami_utils¶

Utility functions for DNA origami designed in cadnano and simulated in oxDNA.

origami_utils.py includes the class: Origami

Functions

angle_sense(v1, v2, axis) Returns the angle between two vectors, using a 3rd vector to determine the sense of the angle.
array_index(mylist, myarray) Returns the index in a list mylist of a numpy array myarray.
dihedral_angle_sense(v1, v2, axis[, …]) Returns the dihedral angle between two vectors, using a 3rd vector to determine the sense of the angle and to define the axis normal to the plane we want the vectors in
get_base_spline(strand[, reverse]) Returns a cartesian spline that represents a fit through the bases for the strand ‘strand’.
get_bb_midpoint(system, strand, n_index, …) Deprecated function, use origami_utils.Origami.get_bb_midpoint instead.
get_nucleotide(vhelix, vbase, vhelix_indices) Deprecated function, use origami_utils.Origami.get_nucleotides instead.
get_pos_midpoint(r1, r2, box) Returns the midpoint of two vectors r1 and r2.
get_sayar_twist(s1, s2, smin, smax[, …]) Returns the twist for a given pair of spline fits, one through the bases of each strand.
get_sayar_writhe(splines1, smin, smax[, …]) Returns the writhe for a 3D spline fit through a set of duplex midpoints.
get_scaffold_index(system) Returns the index of the scaffold strand in the system.
get_vhelix_vis(fname) Reads the ‘virtual helix visibility’ from a text file and ignore any virtual helices set to invisible.
min_distance(r1, r2, box) Returns the minimum image distance in going from r1 to r2, in a box of size box.
norm(vec) Returns a normalised vector.
open_arrow_debug_file(filename[, type]) This function was not documented when it was written.
open_box_debug_file(filename) This function was not documented when it was written.
parse_scanfile(infile) This function was not documented when it was written.
parse_vh_data(filename, origami) Gets vhelices data from file - format is either <auto,[number of vhelices]>, or, if a region of an origami is to be analysed, <[region width],[list of starting nucleotide index for the region for each vhelix]>.
print_arrow_debug_line(begin, end, file) This function was not documented when it was written.
print_box_debug_line(vecs, file) This function was not documented when it was written.
vecs2spline(vecs, per) This function was not documented when it was written.

Classes

Origami([system, cad2cuda_file, visibility]) Origami object.
